content: earbud/cord organizer from emily s art room emilyartroom blogspot com materials size h hook 100% cotton yarn button abbreviations in us terms chain - chain st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch pattern chain 7 turn row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across 6 ​ row 2 - 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 6 ​ row 9 chain 5 slip_stitch to the 6th single_crochet on the opposite side forming the button ​ hole single_crochet down the side of your work and all the way around including the 6 chain stitches on the button hole slip_stitch back in the first slip_stitch cut off weave in ends finishing attach a button in the middle according to the picture approximately the 2nd or 3rd row from the bottom the button is the fun part that makes these little gifts unique so look for one that fits the personality of the person to whom you re giving the gift enjoy
